title: 80 T206 cards with discounts on larger purchases - further price reductions 3/2
author: brianp-beme

posts.post_title: 80 T206 cards with discounts on larger purchases - further price reductions 3/2
posts.post_content:
3/2 - Majority of the pricing has been reduced further

One more shot at selling these fantastic, colorful cards.  Mount them in a scrapbook using photo mounts and no one will ever know of their clipped corner.

Discount for larger purchases:

$75 to $199     -10%
$200 or more   -15%

Buy 3 or more cards - free shipping

A great looking group of T206 cards, all with the obvious clipped bottom left corner.  These cards all came from a near complete set auctioned off a few years ago that all had this similar cut corner.  The majority are crease free and extremely colorful with crisp borders. 

Flaws beside corner issues will be noted, just in case not obvious in scans.  Shipping will be $3.00 for either 1 or 2 cards, and free for purchases of three cards or more.  See above chart for discounts for larger purchases.  A commitment to purchase locks in these cards.

Brian

1/29 - ALL CARDS HAVE NOW BEEN REDUCED (not size-wise, but price-wise). Great looking cards that are looking for collectors who don't mind a card missing a little something. The base prices have been reduced by an average of 12%, and the discounts for larger purchases are still in place. Don't make me clip off additional corners!

Brian

Thought I would give these one more shot, and have reduced the pricing on the majority of the cards.  Don't forget about the discount on larger purchases...more aesthetic bang for the buck.

Brian
Let me check when I get home and see which cards I have need "upgraded".  I personally do not mind the clipped corners!

PM sent regarding all remaining "action shot" cards (as opposed to portraits).
Thanks!
Michael
